explains: v. 精简（工商企业、组织、流程等）使效率更高；使……成为流线型
adj. （液体的流动）顺畅的，畅流的；<旧>流线型的

sentences.en: They're making efforts to streamline their normally cumbersome bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 他们正努力提高其通常臃肿的官僚机构的效率。

sentences.en: Huxley speculated that a coat of hair would insulate against loss of body heat and might streamline the body to reduce drag in flight.
sentences.cn: 赫胥黎推测，一层毛发可以隔离身体热量的流失，并可能使身体呈现流线型，以减少飞行中的阻力。
